title: "Representing salmon and migrating group"
date: "2018-10-08"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"

We've add functionality to the trunk code to allow for the representation of salmon and a more detailed representation of what happens when a migrating group is outside the model domain. For a detailed description of how to use this sub-model please read the documentation provided
[here](/download/attachments/749077570/Implementing_Salmon_modification_Atlantis_code.docx?version=1&modificationDate=1538961208140&api=v2)
